name: Squad of Bandits
conimmunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Medium bandit. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Scimitars
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage, or 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
